DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate safety immunogenicity oral vaccine prevent seasonal influenza . Volunteers receive placebo part study .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Oral Vaccine Prevent Seasonal Influenza
DOC.criteria: In good health establish medical history , physical examination , laboratory test time enrollment . Positive H1 influenza HAI . Has influenza vaccine past 2 year . Current history chronic alcohol consumption and/or illicit and/or recreational drug use . History confirm suspected immunodeficient immunosuppressive condition Positive serology HIV , HCV , HBV Previous serious reaction vaccination anaphylaxis , respiratory problem , hive , abdominal pain . History irritable bowel disease inflammatory digestive gastrointestinal condition could affect intend distribution vaccine target mucosa small intestine Use proton pump inhibitor ( Nexium , Prilosec ) . Stool sample occult blood baseline exam
